mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alim (alim_id, member_id, fcm_token) VALUES (alim_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{token})
mapper.select: SELECT DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alim WHERE fcm_token = #{token}), 0, 0, 1) FROM dual

SELECT a.fcm_token, l.title AS lesson_title FROM sugang s JOIN lesson l ON s.lesson_id = l.lesson_id JOIN alim a ON s.member_id = a.member_id WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(l.start_date || ' ' || l.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') BETWEEN SYSTIMESTAMP AND SYSTIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '5' MINUTE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lounge(lounge_id, lesson_id, lounge_img_url) SELECT lounge_seq.nextval, lesson_id,thumbnail_url FROM lesson le WHERE TO_DATE(le.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 3 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM lounge lo WHERE lo.lesson_id = le.lesson_id )
mapper.select: SELECT a.fcm_token, le.title AS lesson_title FROM lesson le JOIN sugang su ON le.lesson_id = su.lesson_id JOIN alim a ON a.member_id = su.member_id WHERE su.lounge_yn = 1 AND le.lesson_id IN ( SELECT lesson_id FROM lounge WHERE CREATED_AT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) )
